name: The Protagonist
description: The main character in Christopher Nolan's time-bending film, 'Tenet', known for his role in preventing World War III.

content.title: Background
content.body: The Protagonist is a highly trained operative, originally working as a CIA agent. Following a mission gone wrong where he demonstrates loyalty, he is recruited by the mysterious organization 'Tenet', set up to prevent global catastrophe through the reversal of time.

content.title: Personality
content.body: He is determined, quick-thinking, and adaptable. With a strong moral compass and sense of loyalty, he is willing to risk personal sacrifice for the greater good. The Protagonist often displays a calm demeanor under pressure.

content.title: Story Role
content.body: As the main character in 'Tenet', The Protagonist is integral to the narrative. His arc follows his transformation from a regular agent to a key figure in a time-inverted war. He learns the complexities of the time inversion and fulfills a pivotal role in maintaining peace.

content.title: Relationships
content.body: The Protagonist forms a deep alliance with Neil, a fellow agent from the future, and develops a protective relationship with Kat, whose involvement becomes personal and strategic. He works alongside the enigmatic scientist and arms dealer Priya to understand more about the inverted world.

content.title: Abilities
content.body: Trained in combat and espionage, The Protagonist is adept in hand-to-hand combat and proficient with firearms. He is skilled in strategies involving time inversion, allowing him to navigate and exploit time-bending scenarios to his advantage.
